GV Library › News ›

Meet Tiiny 2.0

by Leena Rao Graham Hancock
Tweet Share Pocket

Take a look at the new version of social photo and video sharing app Tiiny, incubated at Kevin Rose’s and Marc Hemeon’s mobile laboratory, North. Tiiny 2.0 includes the ability to reply to photos and videos, keep photos and videos for longer than 24 hours, and more. Check out the video to take a look at the new app!
